mapper.insert: insert into COMMUNITY (communitynumber, communitywriter, communitytitle, communitycontents, communityhit, communityregdate) values (communitynumber_seq.nextval,#{communitywriter},#{communitytitle},#{communitycontents},default,sysdate)
mapper.update: update COMMUNITY set communitytitle=#{communitytitle}, COMMUNITYCONTENTS=#{communitycontents} where COMMUNITYNUMBER=${communitynumber}
